= bmap =

Simple Bitmap library in C

----------------------------------------------------------------------

== Building ==
Try:
* make
* make libbmap
* make install
* make tests
* make runtest

== Usage ==
Include '''bmap.h'''
 
 BMAP* bm = BMap.New( 35 );
 BMap.set( bm, 6 );
 BMap.clear( bm, 5 );
 if( BMap.check( bm, 7 ) )
 {
    /* ... */
 }
 BMap.free( bm );}}}
